src:
What channel is Bournemouth vs Man Utd on? TV and live stream information
Manchester United are looking for the fourth away win in a row as they take on Bournemouth in the Premier League
02 Nov 2019, 07:23 by Aaron Flanagan, https://www.mirror.co.uk/authors/aaron-flanagan/
Manchester United are back in business.
After a torrid season to date, Ole Gunnar Solskjaer has stopped the rot with three consecutive away wins.
Victories at Partizan Belgrade, Norwich and Chelsea and eased pressure on the under-fire boss.
But a trip to Bournemouth is a different prospect, with United struggling at the Vitality Stadium in recent years.
Bournemouth are a tough nut to crack and only have one defeat in their last six Premier League outings - and only conceded one goal in the whole of last month.
Here is all you need to know ahead of the game…


Manchester United hope to continue their winning run this weekend (Image: PA)

When is the game?
The match takes place on Saturday November 2. Kick-off is scheduled for 12:30 GMT.
What TV channel is the game on?
The match is being shown on BT Sport 1.
Can you live stream the game?
If you are a BT Sport subscriber, you can catch the action on the BT Sport app.
Betting odds

Bournemouth: 23/10
Draw: 5/2
Man Utd: 6/5


Odds courtesy of ThePools.com


Mirror Football's Top Stories
